title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The tooth fairy just got reimagined for the tech-savvy generation
items.description: Move over, Santa. Now there’s another magical character for kids to track: the Tooth Fairy. After making a personalized Tooth Fairy video for his neph...

items.title: US insurance giant Aflac says hackers stole personal and health data of 22.6 million people
items.description: Aflac, one of the largest insurance companies in the U.S., confirmed hackers stole reams of personal data, including Social Security numbers, identity...

items.title: Pirate group Anna’s Archive says it has scraped 86 million songs from Spotify
items.description: Spotify says it has identified and disabled the user accounts involved in the scraping.

items.title: France’s postal and banking services disrupted by suspected DDoS attack
items.description: France's postal service, La Poste, said it was hit by a disruptive cyberattack that knocked its services offline.

items.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies
items.description: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thou...

items.title: Zoox issues software recall over lane crossings
items.description: The company has issued a software update to its autonomous driving system to fix its lane-crossing behavior.

items.title: Inside Uzbekistan’s nationwide license plate surveillance system
items.description: The Uzbek government's national license plate scanning system was discovered exposed to the internet for anyone to access without a password.

items.title: Lemon Slice nabs $10.5M from YC and Matrix to build out its digital avatar tech
items.description: Digital avatar generation company Lemon Slice is working to add a video layer to AI chatbots with a new diffusion model that can create digital avatar...

items.title: ServiceNow to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B
items.description: The deal is expected to yield significant returns for Armis investors, including Sequoia, CapitalG, and Insight Partners.

items.title: Hackers stole over $2.7B in crypto in 2025, data shows
items.description: This was another banner year for crypto hacks and heists — 2025 was the third year in a row that a new crypto theft record was set.
